However, Windows and some older software cannot open HEIC files, requiring conversion to JPG or PNG.

faq.q1: Are files sent to a server?
faq.a1: No, all file processing happens only in your browser. Files are never sent to external servers, ensuring complete privacy protection.
faq.q2: Is it free? Are there usage limits?
faq.a2: Completely free. No registration, no file size limits, no daily usage limits. Use as much as you want.
faq.a3: All modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge are supported. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest browser version.
faq.a4: We maintain original quality as much as possible. For images and PDFs, you can adjust quality options to balance file size and quality.
